#summary Types of bugs ThreadSanitizer can detect

 * [http://llvm.org/viewvc/llvm-project/compiler-rt/trunk/lib/tsan/lit_tests/simple_race.c?view=markup Normal data races]
 * [http://llvm.org/viewvc/llvm-project/compiler-rt/trunk/lib/tsan/lit_tests/vptr_harmful_race.cc?view=markup Races on C++ object vptr]
 * [http://llvm.org/viewvc/llvm-project/compiler-rt/trunk/lib/tsan/lit_tests/free_race.c?view=markup Use after free races]
 * [http://llvm.org/viewvc/llvm-project/compiler-rt/trunk/lib/tsan/lit_tests/race_on_mutex.c?view=markup Races on mutexes]
 * [http://llvm.org/viewvc/llvm-project/compiler-rt/trunk/lib/tsan/lit_tests/fd_pipe_race.cc?view=markup Races on file descriptors]
 * [http://llvm.org/viewvc/llvm-project/compiler-rt/trunk/lib/tsan/lit_tests/race_on_barrier.c?view=markup Races on pthread_barrier_t]
 * [http://llvm.org/viewvc/llvm-project/compiler-rt/trunk/lib/tsan/lit_tests/mutex_destroy_locked.cc?view=markup Destruction of a locked mutex]
 * [http://llvm.org/viewvc/llvm-project/compiler-rt/trunk/lib/tsan/lit_tests/thread_leak3.c?view=markup Leaked threads]
